title: Senior Market Manager, Mexico (CRM and Engagement)
content:
Airbnb was born in 2007 when two Hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 4 million Hosts who have welcomed more than 1 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, Hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.The Community You Will Join:
Founded in August of 2008 and based in San Francisco, California, Airbnb is a trusted community marketplace for people to list, discover, and book unique travel experiences around the world. Whether an apartment for a night, a castle for a week, or a villa for a month, Airbnb allows people to Belong Anywhere through unique travel experiences at any price point, in more than 34,000 cities and over 190 countries. We promote a culture of curiosity, humanity, and creativity through our product, brand, and, most importantly, our people.
The Difference You Will Make:
As a Senior Market Manager - CRM and Engagement [Mexico, Central America and the Caribbean], you will be responsible for the supply health and growth in Mexico, Central America and the Caribbean  by managing and acquiring high quality inventory at scale. Focusing on these responsibilities, you will build Airbnb’s strong market presence in your assigned region by collaborating with other teams as the local in-market expert for our longtail comprising tens of thousands of hosts. As someone who knows the Airbnb business, nuances, mission and values inside out, you will develop and iterate scalable localized supply management strategies (acquisition and optimization) for both highly developed destinations as well as nascent and relatively untapped new markets ultimately ensuring our long-term market success.
A Typical Day:

Create and deploy scaled strategies to effectively manage & optimize tens of thousands of Host accounts in Mexico, Central America and the Caribbean through scaled communication - owning the local mass host outreach strategy and execution with the objective of:

Helping Hosts improve their listing/offering to match demand, growing their business results
Improving Host sentiment by supporting hosts and addressing their issues at scale
Educating our host community on Product, Policies and Trends

Coordinate with the central engagement team (that manages global host communications) to have a unified comms calendar for hosts in Mexico, Central America and the Caribbean  with an aligned strategy, tone and voice
Proven ability to handle operational complexity and ability to maximize the impact of limited resources
Support host community programs in your region
Analyze data and utilize data-driven recommendations to identify and action on strategic opportunities in your region to drive increase in sales
Maintain a baseline understanding of the technical integration of various software partners so that you can provide the right support to your clients
Represent Airbnb in external meetings and at industry conferences
Educate clients on all significant product changes and cascade feedback on product and policy to the relevant internal stakeholders
Develop deep knowledge of your assigned geographic markets and become the go-to source for all information relating to local trends and market dynamics for internal and external partners 
Work cross-functionally with product, communications, public policy and customer support teams to ensure our long-term market success.

Your Expertise

8+ years of CRM experience in a consumer-facing, fast-paced e-commerce company
Solid track record of successfully managing and executing large-scale, complex, high volume B2C email campaigns and cross-functional projects. Experience with top-tier ESP a plus
Proven experience working cross-functionally
Strong time management and prioritization skills. Bias towards efficiency - doing more with less
Excellent storytelling and presentation skills and ability to communicate effectively with clients at scale via email, online events, in product (banner, action cards), sms and push
Proficient quantitative skills and proven ability to interpret and apply data throughout your day-to-day work
Strong sense of ownership and entrepreneurial spirit, thriving in ambiguity.
The ability to get things done with constantly changing priorities, projects and deadlines
Passion for Airbnb, travel, and the sharing economy - being an Airbnb host is a plus
Ability to work at both strategic and tactical levels, with a proven track record to execute in ambiguous environments
Ability to work within tight deadlines, adjust to changes in priorities, and balance short-term needs with long-term strategic initiatives
Charismatic self-starter who is resourceful and self-sufficient
Fluency in English and Spanish is a requirement


 

Your Location:
Due to the nature of this position, the successful applicant will need to be based in Mexico City, Mexico to be able to conduct their work. 
Our Commitment To Inclusion & Belonging:
Airbnb is committed to working with the broadest talent pool possible. We believe diverse ideas foster innovation and engagement, and allow us to attract creatively-led people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. All qualified individuals are encouraged to apply.
We strive to also provide a disability inclusive application and interview process. If you are a candidate with a disability and require reasonable accommodation in order to submit an application, please contact us at: reasonableaccommodations@airbnb.com. Please include your full name, the role you’re applying for and the accommodation necessary to assist you with the recruiting process. 
We ask that you only reach out to us if you are a candidate whose disability prevents you from being able to complete our online application.

questions.description:
Airbnb está comprometida en crear un ambiente de trabajo de inclusión y diversidad. A efecto de evaluar nuestros esfuerzos en ese sentido, invitamos a los candidatos a responder voluntariamente una serie de preguntas. La respuesta a cada pregunta es enteramente voluntaria y si deciden no responder, no se generará tratamiento negativo alguno. La respuesta que elija proveer será mantenida bajo confidencialidad, y no será compartida con los supervisores que se encargan del proceso de reclutamiento. (Airbnb is committed to creating an inclusive and diverse work environment. In order to evaluate our efforts in this regard, we invite candidates to voluntarily answer a series of questions. The answer to each question is entirely voluntary and if they decide not to answer, no negative treatment will be generated. The response you choose to provide will be kept confidential, and will not be shared with the supervisors who are in charge of the recruitment process.)  

Airbnb no discrimina en su proceso de reclutamiento y todas las personas que aplican a un empleo en Airbnb son consideradas sin importar su origen étnico, religión, nacionalidad, edad, sexo, estado civil, ascendencia, discapacidad física o mental, género con que se identifique, orientación sexual, o cualquier otra característica protegida por ley. La oportunidad de proporcionar la información antes señalada le es dada con el objetivo de ayudarnos a medir nuestros esfuerzos por mejorar la inclusión y la diversidad, y para cumplir con nuestros estándares internos de brindar acceso igualitario a oportunidades laborales. (Airbnb does not discriminate in its recruitment process and all people who apply for a job on Airbnb are considered regardless of their ethnic origin, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, gender with which they identify , sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by law. The opportunity to provide the aforementioned information is given to you in order to help us measure our efforts to improve inclusion and diversity, and to comply with our internal standards of providing equal access to employment opportunities.)

Toda su información personal, incluyendo su género, origen étnico, e información sobre discapacidades físicas o mentales, en caso que elija proporcionarlas, será recolectada, almacenada y procesada de acuerdo con el Aviso de Privacidad de Airbnb. (All of your personal information, including your gender, ethnicity, and information on physical or mental disabilities, should you choose to provide it, will be collected, stored and processed in accordance with the Airbnb Privacy Notice.)

Por favor, haga click acá para leer el Aviso de Privacidad de Airbnb, y por favor haga click debajo para aceptarlo. Este Aviso de Privacidad no es un contrato, tácito o expreso, y no establece términos o condiciones de empleo. (Please click here to read the Airbnb Privacy Notice, and please click below to accept it. This Privacy Notice is not a contract, tacit or express, and does not establish terms or conditions of employment.)
